detail_desc: Two-strand metal necklace with one shorter, chunky chain and one longer thin chain. Round, embossed pendant. Adjustable length 37-44 cm.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit. Turn-up at the hem with embroidered text on the front.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Metal rings in various designs. Size adjustable.
Fitted top in stretch cotton jersey with a low-cut back and short sleeves.
Long, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, draping over the bust and a seam at the waist. Partly lined.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details, a high waist and zip fly with a button.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit modal and cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top and long sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft viscose jersey with lace details. V-neck top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and short shorts with an elasticated waist.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft, ribbed cotton jersey. Top with a rib-trimmed neckline and short sleeves with overlocked edges. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist and overlocked hems.
Short, fitted dress in printed jersey with short, rib-trimmed sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Short jumper in a soft knit with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut blouse in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Short elasticated plastic necklaces.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with and elasticated waist and a jacquard-patterned section on the legs. Seamless.
V-neck body in pleated jersey with a sheen. Wrapover top, long raglan sleeves with wide elastication at the cuffs, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Trenchcoat woven in a modal blend with notch lapels, shoulder tabs with decorative buttons, 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, side pockets and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims. Slits at the hem.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lightweight, unlined sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed shaft.
Waist belt in two strands of metal snake chain with a decorative knot detail at the front and an adjustable fastener with a small carabiner hook and metal chain.

Leotard in glossy jersey with a glittery print on the front. Slightly wider neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a lined gusset. Seam at the waist with a glittery elastic waistband and skirt in a double layer of tulle with a glittery top layer. The leotard comes with an elastic hairband that has glittery appliqués in the shape of cat ears.
Sandals with covered block heels, two straps at the front, a diagonal strap over the foot and an elasticated heel strap. Imitation leather insoles and smooth soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Set with a top and joggers in marled slub cotton. Top with long raglan sleeves and buttons at the top. Joggers with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in an airy rib knit with a V-neck and button placket.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and a lace detail and narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Aviator-style sunglasses with a decoration on one side. Metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a slightly higher waist, ties at one side and wider sides.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Three with a print motif.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist containing a concealed key pocket. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and slits at the hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.

Leather jacket with notch lapels with press-studs, a diagonal zip down the front and shoulder tabs with a press-stud. Four zipped front pockets, a small front pocket with a flap and press-stud, and one inner pocket. Zips at the cuffs and a sewn-on belt with a metal buckle at the hem. Lined.
T-shirt in lightweight cotton jersey with a deep V-neck.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, pleated paper bag waist, decorative buttons at the sides, zip fly and button and tapered legs with creases.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a decorative bow at the neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and chunky soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 8 cm.
Jersey top with a slightly wider neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Shirt in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, flap chest pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Soft, non-wired bras in lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in soft, ribbed jersey with covered elastication at the waist and slits in the sides.

Straight-cut jacket in soft faux shearling with a hood, zip down the front, handwarmer pockets and pockets in the side seams. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. Lining in a recycled polyester weave.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in jersey with a round neckline and a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Smocked seam under the bust and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Sunglasses with transparent plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Cardigan in a soft, loose knit with dolman sleeves, close-fitting cuffs and a rounded hem. No buttons.
Short-sleeved nightdress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Joggers in washed cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side and back pockets and elasticated hems. Loose fit.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets. No buttons.
Short-style, padded satin bomber jacket with beaded mesh at the front and long raglan sleeves. Zip down the front, welt side pockets and ribbing around neckline, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
5-pocket, knee-length denim skirt with a raw-edge hem.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. V-shaped opening at the top and a collar with ties at the front. Pleat at the back of the neck, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Set with a pair of mittens and a hat with earflaps in a fine knit. Hat with a pompom on top, ties under the chin and a fleece lining. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top. Size 0-2M and 2-6M without thumbs.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Shortie briefs in cotton with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length 43-50 cm.

Short, wrapover dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, concealed press-stud at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce and sewn-on bow. Seam at the waist with a tie belt, a gently flared skirt and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Microfibre body with a push-up bra and gentle sculpting effect on the waist, hips, back and seat. Underwired bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps, a silicone trim at the top, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with a hook-and-eye fastening.
Earrings and ear cuffs in metal. Five hoop earrings. Eight ear cuffs.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a shimmering metallic finish and a detachable, fleece-lined hood. Zip down the front with a round tab and a chin guard at the top, discreet pockets in the side seams and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbed cuffs and hems.
Fitted top in sturdy, textured jersey with a seam and peplum at the hem. Long sleeves with a seam and flared cuffs.
Shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, and detachable belt at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric in a narrow cut at the top with short, thin shoulder straps and deep armholes. Loose-fitting.

Set with one pair of earrings, two different earrings and three ear cuffs. One pair of hoop earrings with a rectangular pendant, one hoop earring with a pearly plastic bead and one stud earring with a plastic bead. Two ear cuffs with plastic beads and one with a metal pendant. Size from 0.3 cm to 5 cm.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
V-neck jumper in a soft double knit containing some mohair with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides and hem.
Punch-patterned fancy dress mask in metal with sparkly stones and an elastic strap.
